title: Twisted Faith
description: In this Dateline classic, Josh Mankiewicz reports on a surprising crime, hidden for years, that centers around a charismatic pastor harboring a sinful secret. Originally aired on NBC on April 9, 2010.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
